languages.text: {n}Техножрец чуть прищуривается, будто невесело улыбается под респиратором.{/n} "Скорее принимали участие в акте моего отложенного суицида".
{n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец чуть прищуривается, будто невесело улыбается под респиратором.{/n} "Скорее принимали участие в акте моего отложенного суицида".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡微微眯起了眼睛，仿佛在呼吸器后面露出了阴郁的笑容。{/n}“我更愿意把它称为‘参与我的延迟自杀活动’。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡微微眯起了眼睛，仿佛在呼吸器后面露出了阴郁的笑容。{/n}“我更愿意把它称为‘参与我的延迟自杀活动’。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote entrecierra ligeramente los ojos, como si riera sin humor por detrás del respirador.{/n} «Yo preferiría llamarlo participar en mi propio suicidio pospuesto».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote entrecierra ligeramente los ojos, como si riera sin humor por detrás del respirador.{/n} «Yo preferiría llamarlo participar en mi propio suicidio pospuesto».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}技術司祭は少し目を細める。呼吸器の奥で不敵に笑っているように感じられた。{/n}「私はむしろ、自分の繰り延べられた自殺に加担しているといえるやもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭は少し目を細める。呼吸器の奥で不敵に笑っているように感じられた。{/n}「私はむしろ、自分の繰り延べられた自殺に加担しているといえるやもしれない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester Verengt ein wenig die Augen, als würde er hinter seinem Respirator humorlos lächeln.{/n} "Ich würde es eher als Teilnahme an meinem verzögerten Suizid bezeichnen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester Verengt ein wenig die Augen, als würde er hinter seinem Respirator humorlos lächeln.{/n} "Ich würde es eher als Teilnahme an meinem verzögerten Suizid bezeichnen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre plisse légèrement les yeux, comme s'il souriait tristement derrière son respirateur.{/n} « Disons plutôt que vous avez participé à mon suicide ajourné. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre plisse légèrement les yeux, comme s'il souriait tristement derrière son respirateur.{/n} « Disons plutôt que vous avez participé à mon suicide ajourné. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip, gözlerini biraz kısıyor. Sanki solunum cihazının arkasından tatsız tatsız gülümsüyor.{/n} "Bu durumu, ertelenmiş intiharımın bir parçası olmak şeklinde tanımlamayı tercih ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eyes a little, as though he is smiling mirthlessly behind his respirator.{/n} "I'd rather call it taking part in my deferred suicide."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip gözlerini biraz kısıyor. Sanki solunum cihazının arkasında tatsız tatsız gülümsüyor gibi.{/n} "Bunu ertelenmiş intiharımın bir parçası olmak şeklinde tanımlamayı tercih ederim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
